section.title: Conclusion
section.para: [This section is a conclusion for the entire document. It provides an overall summary to the report. It should include the demonstrated capabilities, lessons learned, major recommendations, and a summary of what steps should be taken to ensure that the concluding results will help to further refine plans, policies, procedures, and training for this type of incident.
Subheadings are not necessary and the level of detail in this section does not need to be as comprehensive as that in the Executive Summary.]
